Project Homepage
 
[hide private]
[ Module Hierarchy | Class Hierarchy ]

Module Hierarchy

  • trunk.BIP: Bayesian Inference Package containing usefull classes and functions for doing inference in various applications.
    • trunk.BIP.Bayes: Basic Likelihood tools such as functions for computing likelihoods, Latin Hypercube sampling (efficient random sampling) and other tools which don't belong on other packages, or apply to multiple packages.
      • trunk.BIP.Bayes.Melding
      • trunk.BIP.Bayes.PlotMeld: Module with specialized plotting functions for the Melding results
      • trunk.BIP.Bayes.Samplers
        • trunk.BIP.Bayes.Samplers.MCMC: Module implementing MCMC samplers
      • trunk.BIP.Bayes.general: This package contain classes the deal with Bayesian inference based on numerical representation of a variable distribution.
        • trunk.BIP.Bayes.general.bvariables: This module implements classes to represent an arbitrary Bayesian random variable.
      • trunk.BIP.Bayes.lhs
      • trunk.BIP.Bayes.like
    • trunk.BIP.SDE: Package with tools for the simulation of Stochastic differential equations.
      • trunk.BIP.SDE.example
      • trunk.BIP.SDE.gillespie
    • trunk.BIP.SMC: Package with Sequential Monte Carlo routines.
      • trunk.BIP.SMC.condensation
    • trunk.BIP.Viz
      • trunk.BIP.Viz.ascii: This module contains code to generate ascii representations of statistical objects
      • trunk.BIP.Viz.asciihist: This module contains code to generate ascii representations of statistical objects
      • trunk.BIP.Viz.realtime
    • trunk.BIP.__version__
    • trunk.BIP.logsetup
